thread.title: good location, wonderful employees
thread.title_full: good location, wonderful employees - Review of pentahotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: belmonteos
title: good location, wonderful employees
text: Located very close to two subway stations in Beijing, this hotel boasts of wonderful frontline employees who go out of their way to help solve any difficulty a guest may encounter during a stay in China. Very few people speak English in China but the crew at the reception have a very good command of the language. I especially thank Tony, Lucas and Jessica who have been a great help to me. Also, within the hotel is a very good noodle restaurant.
